General.Name: Yung Zip Chemical Ind Co Ltd
General.Description: Yung Zip Chemical Ind. Co., Ltd., a bulk drug manufacturing company, supplies active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs), API intermediates, and specialty chemicals worldwide. It offers antihypertensive, anti-viral, iron chelator, anti-inflammatory, analgesic, antipyretic, anti-fungal, anti-cancer, schizophrenia, anticoagulant, genital herpes outbreak, hypnotic, and sedative products. The company also offers excipients, such as sodium starch glycolate; and custom research and manufacturing services. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
